availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James S. Phelps (Louisville, Kentucky, trader and farmer)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, trader and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary J. Glass Phelps. Father of John H. Phelps, James C. Phelps, Zack Phelps, and Laban Phelps. Trader and farmer in Louisville in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, District 1, p. 486; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, p. 71; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 11, p. 210; Find A Grave, "James Shipp Phelps (1828-1913)," Memorial #133283212, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=133283212 (accessed June 21, 2017); KYR-0001-029-0522.
